Author: nothinginlifematters
Text: Yeah i don’t think he realizes it though. He is overweight and I think pushing “healthy” (aka low) body weight on his kids, mostly because he doesn’t want them to end up like him. He’s very influenced by his mother, and that’s just.. that’s a whole new post right there to be totally honest.

Author: garlish13
Text: i feel so bad for you and i can relate. parents can be very toxic but they do care for you i guess. my parents are always on me for ed stuff and i’ve opened up to my dad a little bit before about my ed thoughts and how i feel about my body but he still makes such gross comments and it sucks. i feel you though
